mapper.insert: insert into category values(null, '미분류', '미분류된 카테고리 입니다.', #{_parameter})
mapper.select: select no, name, description from category where blog_id = #{_parameter} order by no asc
select no from category where blog_id = #{_parameter} order by no asc
select no, name from category where blog_id = #{_parameter} order by no asc
select c.no, c.name, count(*) as postCount, c.description from category as c JOIN post as p ON c.no = p.category_no where c.blog_id = #{_parameter} group by p.category_no order by c.no asc
